name: Spell It The Same Both Ways! Trivia Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
The answer to this palindrome is made up of a man's name and a woman's name, eg, David and Enid.
. . . . . . and . . . . sinned?
questions.correct: Dennis and Edna & dennis and edna
questions.explanation:
Dennis and Edna & dennis and edna.

	Dennis and Edna sinned.  Two much harder palindromes using peoples names are; Lisa Bonet ate no basil, and; Kay, a red nude, peeped under a yak.

questions.text:
Finish the following 2D palindrome (reads the same across and down);
G E L
E Y E
_ _ _
questions.explanation:
LEG & leg & Leg.

	The earliest known 2D palindrome was written in Latin!

questions.text:
Fill in the blanks with the names of two European cities to complete this palindrome, eg, Paris and Stockholm.
Anne, I vote more cars race . . . . to . . . . . .
questions.explanation:
Rome and Vienna.

	Anne, I vote more cars race Rome to Vienna.

questions.text:
Fill in the blanks with the names of two foods to complete this palindrome, eg, steak and chips.
Go hang a . . . . . . , I'm a . . . . . . . hog!
questions.explanation:
salami and lasagna.

	Go hang a salami, I'm a lasagna hog!

questions.text:
This palindrome is short and to the point.  Fill in the blank with the six letter name of a car to complete it.
A . . . . . .

Even easier than the last one!  The answer is a one word girls name.
Ah Satan sees . . . . . . .

This is a simple repeating palindrome!  To complete this one think of science!
And . . . , and . . . , and . . .
questions.explanation:
DNA.

	And DNA, and DNA, and DNA (infinitum!)

questions.text:
This palindrome requires a woman's name and a man's name to complete it, eg, Donna and Elliot.
Did I draw . . . . . too tall, . . . . . . ?  I did.
questions.explanation:
Della and Edward.

	Did I draw Della too tall, Edward? I did.

questions.text:
Fill in the blank with a solo musical artist's name, eg, Beethoven, to complete this palindrome.
Plan no damn . . . . . . . LP.
questions.explanation:
Madonna.

	Plan no damn Madonna LP.

questions.text:
And finally, another 2D palindrome;
R A T S
A B U T
T U B A
_ _ _ _
questions.correct: STAR & Star & star & STAB & stab & Stab & STAG & Stag & stag
questions.explanation:
STAR & Star & star & STAB & stab & Stab & STAG & Stag & stag.

	And the answer is; S T A R
